ygData.subject: Re: Halo of Light spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, sorry I forgot mention this, it s kind of tricky.  The spell Halo of Light is sold in the Temple of Life in Queynos.  Speak to all the female NPC s
ygData.messageBody:
> Thanks to all who responded to my question about level 12
> spells. I decided
> to get Halo of Light, but cannot find it anywhere (I am in
> Qeynos). Anyone
> know where this can be purchased? Thanks again.

Yes, sorry I forgot mention this, it's kind of tricky. The spell Halo
of Light is sold in the Temple of Life in Queynos. Speak to all the
female NPC's inside the building, one of them sells it.

Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
